channel.title: If you could steal it from jagex
channel.description:
How did people get their hands on the first source?
Did jagex have vulnerabilities in their source which made it steal-able?
If it happened to jagex with RSC and RS2 then its possible to rip off other people's sources aswel?

item.title: If you could steal it from jagex
item.dc:creator: @Janzzz Janzzz
item.description:
@Janzzz wrote:

must be pro to code actual RSC private server from scratch…

Prob not rip off other sources because there not webclients but i dunno[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 01, 2008, 03:21:16 am[/size][hr]well i just downloaded the html of runescapes account management looking for more to download. name me some to download off there website
[/quote]
lold hard.[/quote]

Lol. Since when did view source become downloading.

item.title: If you could steal it from jagex
item.dc:creator: @inTouch inTouch
item.description:
@inTouch wrote:

Only source that we have that’s made by JaGEX is probably the mudclient, which has been deobfuscated from *.class files. The first server ever was made by frank_ which was just a open-socketed realm to where you could connect with JaGEX’s client. The graphics etc are ripped from JaGEX, but everything server-related is made by 3rd party people.

Read full topic
item.source: If you could steal it from jagex
